name: getVariablesInCategory
shortDescription: Returns all variables of a category
description: This method returns all variables of a category.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The ID of the category as returned by createCategory() or getCategories().

returnValue: Returns variables assigned to the specified category. The root element is a Struct with all peer IDs as key and all channels as value (Struct). The channels again have the variables as value (Array<String>).
